```py
csvsql --query "
SELECT Chains AS 'Food Chains', Sales
FROM usa_ff
WHERE Sales >= 4000
ORDER BY Sales DESC
LIMIT 5" usa_ff.csv
```

```py
Food Chains,Sales
McDonald's,45960.0
Starbucks,24300.0
Chick-fil-A,16700.0
Taco Bell,12600.0
Wendy's,11111.0
```

```py
csvsql --query "
SELECT Chains AS 'Food Chains', Sales
FROM usa_ff
WHERE Sales >= 4000
ORDER BY Sales DESC
LIMIT 5" usa_ff.csv | csvlook 
```

```py
| Food Chains |  Sales |
| ----------- | ------ |
| McDonald's  | 45,960 |
| Starbucks   | 24,300 |
| Chick-fil-A | 16,700 |
| Taco Bell   | 12,600 |
| Wendy's     | 11,111 |
```

```py
csvsql --query "
SELECT Chains AS 'Food Chains', Sales
FROM usa_ff
WHERE Sales >= 4000
ORDER BY Sales DESC
LIMIT 5" usa_ff.csv > filtered_usa_ff.csv
```
